title: Quality and Property Tanru
goal: Practice tanru with quality words like sutra, xamgu, xlali.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Week 10 vocabulary check:

blue → ?      wide → ?
green → ?     deep → ?
long → ?      short → ?

(Answers: blanu, ganra, crino, condi, clani, tordu)

New Material (5-7 min)

Vocabulary Review

No new gismu today — focus on combining quality words you already know:

Lojban English
sutra fast
xamgu good
xlali bad
melbi beautiful

Quality + Action Tanru

Quality words can modify actions:

sutra bajra → fast-run

Running that is fast.

xamgu citka → good-eat

Eating that is good (eating well, or eating good food — ambiguous).

xlali tavla → bad-talk

Talking that is bad (speaking poorly, or saying bad things).

Quality + Object Tanru

Quality words can also modify objects:

xamgu plise → good apple
melbi zdani → beautiful house
xlali cukta → bad book

In Full Sentences

mi sutra bajra

I run fast. (I fast-run.)

la .bob. cu xamgu citka

Bob eats well. (Bob good-eats.)

ti melbi zdani

This is a beautiful house.

Tanru Ambiguity Preview

xamgu citka could mean:

  • eating in a good way
  • eating good food
  • healthy eating

Context determines meaning. We'll explore this more tomorrow.

Key Point

Quality words modify actions or objects, creating compound concepts with loose meanings.
sections.title: New Material (5-7 min)

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Quality + Action

Create tanru:

  1. fast-go → ?
  2. good-run → ?
  3. bad-eat → ?
  4. fast-talk → ?
Answers
  1. sutra klama
  2. xamgu bajra
  3. xlali citka
  4. sutra tavla

Exercise 2: Quality + Object

Create tanru:

  1. beautiful cat → ?
  2. good book → ?
  3. bad house → ?
  4. fast car → ?
Answers
  1. melbi mlatu
  2. xamgu cukta
  3. xlali zdani
  4. sutra karce

Exercise 3: Full Sentences

Translate:

  1. I run fast.
  2. Bob eats well.
  3. This is a beautiful apple.
  4. Alice speaks poorly.
Answers
  1. mi sutra bajra
  2. la .bob. cu xamgu citka
  3. ti melbi plise
  4. la .alis. cu xlali tavla

Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Say aloud:

  1. "I go quickly." → mi sutra klama
  2. "This is a good book." → ti xamgu cukta
  3. "The cat is beautiful." → la mlatu cu melbi

Summary

You practiced quality tanru. Words like sutra, xamgu, and melbi can modify both actions and objects.

Tomorrow preview: Tanru ambiguity — why gerku zdani can mean many things.
